results.title: A Chronic problem
results.creator_credit: Cynthia Scott, Wolf Koenig, Andy Thomson and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Discussion in bioethics”.
One of a series of short, open-ended dramas designed to stimulate discussion of values and ethics in relation to modern medical technology. This film considers the chronic patient’s right to quality care, and the acutely ill patient’s right to a hospital bed. Jean is suffering from multiple sclerosis and is almost completely paralyzed. It seems that the only ones who care about her are the nurses. With the arrival of a patient in need of an operation, it becomes apparent that chronic patients have little priority.

results.title: A Christmas Special with Luciano Pavarotti
results.brief_description: A glorious concert performed at the spectacular Notre Dame Cathedral, Montreal, Luciano Pavarotti’s Christmas present to music lovers everywhere. Conducted by Franz Paul Decker with “Les Petits Chanteurs” and “Les disciples de Massenmet”. Features “Christmas Medley”, “O Holy Night”, “Pieta Signore”, “Gloria”, “Silent Night”, “Ave Maria”, “Mille Cherubini in Coro”, “Agnus Dei”, “Gesu Bambino”, “Panis Angelicus”, “Oh Come All Ye Faithful”, “O Jesu Christii”, and “Hallelujah Chorus”.

results.title: A Christmas fantasy
results.creator_credit: Tom Daly, ONF | NFB and John Feeney
results.brief_description: This film depicts impressions of the lights of Christmas as they transform a winter’s night. Captures the illusive magic of a northern Christmas when fresh snow lies softly on pine trees and roof tops and multi-coloured lights glow on surfaces of purest white. The myriad lights of a city, the wonder on children’s faces, lyrical music, dramatic colour effects with trick photography - all combine to create the nostalgic mood of Christmas. (Award: Columbus)

results.title: A Christmas dream [English version]
results.creator_credit: United World Films and Karel Zeman
results.brief_description: A fantasy in which a little girl’s toys come to life in a dream - the toys being played by Puppets. (The film is noteworthy for the excellence of the puppet animation in the original material - for American distribution, introductory and concluding sequences have been added to the film by Castle Films, USA.). This film was directed by Karel Zeman at the Gottwaldov Puppet Studios, Czechoslovakia.

results.title: A Chord for voices
results.creator_credit: Malcolm Otton, Film Australia, OTC Australia and Philip Robertson
results.brief_description: In July 1976 a new undersea communications link was completed between Papua New Guinea, Australia and the rest of the world. Complicated cable laying techniques are shown, and in the background is the exotic and beautiful Papua New Guinea scenery. By plugging in to the international community, the indigenous people will feel greater pressure to surrender their traditions and customs, and to develop towards a more cosmopolitan way of life. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: A Choice of two
results.brief_description: White-collar crime and corporate in-fighting merge as a chairman of the board must choose his successor from between two competent executives. All eyes are on the contenders when it is discovered that a defrauding of Farabee Industries is being orchestrated by someone within the arena of power. This drama was based on an actual case history and looks at an aspect of business ethics. Stars Leslie Nielsen. (Awards: Toronto)

results.title: A Chinese ghost story III = Sinnui yauman III [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Tsui Hark, Golden Princess Films and Ching Siu-tung
results.brief_description: ‘The Chinese Ghost Story’ series integrates ideas and images from Western horror films (using techniques and technologies developed in the Cinefex Workshop), with those from a classical Chinese story by Pu Song-Ling. In this part the Tree Devil from the first two parts wakes after a hundred-year sleep. Buddhism has gained its following in the Jiang hu (‘vagrant world’), a turbulent society ‘without rules’. A high priest and student monk are the custodians of a Sacred Golden Buddha which is transmogrified in the haunted Orchid Temple. The monks also go through changes as they encounter alluring demonesses and put the Tree Devil to the sword. Cast includes Tony Leung, Jacky Cheung and Wang Hsu Hsien. In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.title: A Chinese ghost story II = Sinnui yauman II [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Tsui Hark, Golden Princess Film Production Ltd and Ching Siu-tung
results.brief_description: The story has its origins in a Chinese short story by Pu Song-ling which was also the basis of Li Hanxiang’s 1958 film, ‘The Enchanted Shadow’. The internationally successful trio of ‘Chinese Ghost Story’ films integrates ideas and images from Western movies and John Carpenter films with the classical Chinese story. Here, the plot takes up where part 1 leaves off, with Leslie Cheung as a wandering scholar turning his back on the gates of hell, only to find himself fending off attacks from a decomposing giant. He is drawn into guerilla action to free an unjustly imprisoned official and finds himself torn between the love of the official’s two daughters. The film is a mixture of high style, low comedy, steamy romantic interludes, spectacular special effects and rapid-fire editing. Cast also includes Wang Zu Zian (Wang Tsu-hsien) and Wu Ma (Wo Ma). In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.creator_credit: Tsui Hark, Cinema City Co, Film Workshop and Ching Siu-tung
results.brief_description: Leslie Cheung stars as Ning Tsai-Shen, a timid tax collector who happens upon the haunted Lan Ro temple where he meets and falls in love with Nieh Hsiao-Tsing a restless ghost (Joey Wong) whose soul is being held captive by a hideous tree demon.

constellations_other.name: Jason Phu and genre-bending kung fu films
constellations_other.description: Analects of Kung Phu work is a philosophical guide to life via martial arts films, drawing on his interest in Vietnamese and Chinese folklore, which inspires many of the films featured in this Constellation.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Tsui Hark, Cinema City Co, Film Workshop and Ching Siu-tung
results.description: Leslie Cheung (Happy Together) stars as Ning Tsai-Shen, a timid tax collector who happens upon the haunted Lan Ro temple where he meets and falls in love with Nieh Hsiao-Tsing a restless ghost (Joey Wong) whose soul is being held captive by a hideous tree demon. Enlisting the help of a mysterious Taoist monk (Wu Ma), the young tax collector tries to free the girl’s spirit and lay it to rest before her eminent marriage to the evil mountain demon. Employing rapid editing, surreal imagery (including a demon with a giant killer tongue) and spectacular fight sequences, ‘A Chinese ghost story’ is a fine example of the kinetic energy and outlandish sensibility that is a staple of the Hong Kong fantasy genre. Also starring Joi Wang. In Cantonese with English subtitles.
